solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the two $8 cards: ${value_per_card}/card * {num_cards_given} cards = $<<{value_per_card}*{num_cards_given}={total_given}>>{total_given}
Then subtract the cost of the cards Nicky gave away from the cost of the card he received to find his profit: ${value_received} - ${total_given} = $<<{value_received}-{total_given}={profit}>>{profit}
